name: Traffic Madness
description:
City traffic is getting out of the hand. A traffic light has broken in the city, things are going crazy. We need your help to keep the traffic flowing. Don’t let the cars crash with each other and keep the number of accidents as low as possible. Tap to let the cars go or stop them when necessary. Avoid making the traffic blocks on the city but do not rush things out, remember, you don't want to cause chaos on the city. Just don’t let the cars overtake and disrupt the flow of cars in this traffic control simulator.


Main Features:

★It’s Free To Play

★Challenge Your Friends

★Fun Gameplay

★Amazing Graphics Quality

★Smooth Gameplay

★Clean Interface

★Simulated Car Crashes And Explosions


We are always ready to hear suggestions to improve the quality and add new things to our game. If you have any suggestion or problem with the game, leave it on the comments down below. Also if you liked the game  you can get it on google play for free
